info.title: Characteristic Attribute Catalog - Read
info.description: The catalog data that is read with this service consists of plant-specific selected sets with their codes that are used to record inspection results for qualitative characteristics, for example, the codes 01 (Smooth) and 02 (Rough) for the characteristic ***Surface***.

x-sap-shortText: Read catalog data that is used to document the quality inspection results for qualitative characteristics using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Quality Management in Stock Handling(1MR)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1MR " Link To BP ")
[Quality Management in Discrete Manufacturing(1E1)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1E1 " Link To BP ")

tags.name: Characteristic Attribute Selected Set Codes and Code Groups
Characteristic Attribute Selected Set Code Texts

get.summary: Reads all selected sets of catalog type Characteristic Attributes.
get.description: Reads all characteristic attribute selected sets with statuses and administrative data. Characteristic attributes are values of qualitative inspection characteristics in a coded format. The characteristic attribute codes can be combined in a plant-specific selected set, which is allowed or useful for a particular application.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: SelectedCodeSetPlant
parameters.description: Plant

parameters.name: SelectedCodeSet
parameters.description: Selected Set

get.summary: Reads a specific selected set of catalog type Characteristic Attributes.
get.description: Reads a specific characteristic attribute selected set in a specific plant with statuses and administrative data. Characteristicattributes are values of qualitative inspection characteristics in a coded format. The characteristic attribute codes can be combined in a plant-specific selected set, which is allowed or useful for a particular application.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads all selected set codes and code groups of catalog type Characteristic Attributes.
get.description: Reads all codes and their code groups that are contained in plant-specific characteristic attribute selected sets. You can retrieve administration data and valuation data.
tags: Characteristic Attribute Selected Set Codes and Code Groups

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*
